FAQs

The Smart Job Search Platform for Skilled Trades Professionals.

To get started, click “Sign Up” and follow the prompts to create your job seeker profile. You’ll be asked to enter some basic information like your work experience, skills, and preferred roles. Once your profile is set up, you can apply to jobs with just a few clicks—no need to re-enter your details.
